vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.34.8;
father of: Joah (H3098J)
§ Joahaz or Jehoahaz = "Jehovah has grasped"
the father of Joah, Josiah's chronicler
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יְהוֹאָחָז   hijo de Jehú; rey de Israel (814/13-798); (b)   padre de Joah, archivista; en tiempos de Josías; (c) ֶשַׁלּוּם ,יְהוֹאָחָז   hijo de Josías; rey de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約哈斯 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "耶和華已掌握"
1) 約西亞王的史官約亞的父親 (代下 36:2)
2) 猶大王約西亞的兒子, 作猶大王三個月後被擄至埃及 (代下 36:1-4) 見 [3059]
3) 北國以色列的王, 耶戶的兒子 (王下 14:1)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约哈斯 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "耶和华已掌握"
1) 约西亚王的史官约亚的父亲 (代下 36:2)
2) 犹大王约西亚的儿子, 作犹大王三个月后被掳至埃及 (代下 36:1-4) 见 [3059]
3) 北国以色列的王, 耶户的儿子 (王下 14:1)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.10.35;
son of: Jehu (H3058H);
father of: Joash (H3101J); also called Joahaz at 2Ki.14.1;
Another spelling of ye.ho.a.chaz (יְהוֹאָחָז "Jehoahaz" H3059)
§ Joahaz or Jehoahaz = "Jehovah has grasped"
the father of Joah, Josiah's chronicler

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.23.30;
son of: Josiah (H2977) and Hamutal (H2537);
brother of: Zedekiah (H6667H);
half-brother of: Jehoiakim (H3079) and Shallum (H7967J); also called Johanan at 1Ch.3.15(?);
Another spelling of ye.ho.a.chaz (יְהוֹאָחָז "Jehoahaz" H3059H)
§ Joahaz or Jehoahaz = "Jehovah has grasped"
the father of Joah, Josiah's chronicler
